title: Newspaper headlines: Calls for Andrew 'inquiry' and hiding from 'Putin's killer drones'

title: Government’s response to Maccabi Tel Aviv fan ban was ‘clumsy’, say MPs
description: Select committee says ‘late’ decision to overturn exclusion of fans ‘did little more than inflame tensions’
content:
The government’s response to West Midlands police’s ban on Maccabi Tel Aviv fans was “clumsy”, “late” and “did little more than inflame tensions”, a group of MPs has found.
A report by the home affairs select committee, published on Sunday, analysed ... [4497 chars]

title: How Birmingham is getting ahead of measles by encouraging vaccine uptake
description: Nurses and doctors are trying to understand and assuage the concerns some patients have over vaccines.
content:
Sometimes Lorna Grinnell-Moore, a nurse in Birmingham, gets the phone slammed down on her. Often, she has to listen to the most outlandish conspiracy theories and, on one occasion, she recalls being verbally abused.

title: Bafta Film Awards 2026: Who's nominated, how to watch and everything else you need to know
description: The biggest night in the British film calendar is upon us - find out who's nominated and how to watch.
content:

title: Leigh Wood vs Josh Warrington 2: Leigh Wood easily outpoints Josh Warrington in grudge rematch
description: Home favourite Leigh Wood comfortably outpoints Josh Warrington in their rematch at Nottingham's Motorpoint Arena.
content:
